params.index: is the index at which to retrieve the request.

returns._0: An uint256 representing the price for a FAST deployment request.
An uint256 representing the number of FAST deployment requests ever made.

params.params: The parameters for the FAST deployment.

params.newPrice: The new price of a FAST deployment request.

fastDeploymentRequest(uint256).notice: This function allows to get previously made FAST deployment requests.

fastDeploymentRequestPrice().notice: Allows querying the current price for a FAST deployment request.

fastDeploymentRequestsCount().notice: This function returns the number of FAST deployment requests ever made.

requestDeployment(string).notice: This function allows users to request a FAST deployment.

setFastDeploymentRequestPrice(uint256).notice: This function allows an issuer member to change the price of a FAST deployment request.

userdoc.notice: The Marketplace Fast Deployments facet is in charge of keeping track of requested Fast Deployments.
